comments: Martin (MIA) is already in O'Neale's (BKN) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
O'Neale (BKN) and Martin (MIA) briefly engage and disengage following the expiration of the pick.
O'Neale (BKN) moves through Martin's (MIA) space and delivers contact that drives him off of his legally obtained screening position.
Claxton (BKN) legally contests Adebayo's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Thomas (BKN) switches his pivot foot on the perimeter.
Herro (MIA) moves laterally into Thomas' (BKN) path and initiates body to body contact that affects his driving shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) cleanly blocks Thomas' (BKN) shot attempt before the ball has reached its apex, and before the ball has started its downward flight towards the basket.
Smith Jr. (MIA) steps slightly forward towards Herro's (MIA) path, and marginal contact occurs as they come together at the same spot.
O'Neale (BKN) is already in Martin's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.

Thomas (BKN) gathers the ball on his right foot and lands simultaneously on both feet for his step one.  Thomas then moves his right foot, establishing his left as his pivot foot, and he maintains his pivot foot prior to elevating for the shot attempt.

Butler (MIA) is drawn into the air by the pump fake from Thomas (BKN) and makes contact with Thomas' body that affects his shot attempt.  This contact occurs prior to, and causes, any contact from Thomas to Butler's head.
Smith Jr. (BKN) is moving alongside Herro's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
O'Neale (BKN) is already in Martin's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Claxton (BKN) wraps Adebayo (MIA), which affects his ability to secure the rebound.

Replay review of the foul called on Herro (MIA) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful.  Herro moves laterally into Bridges' (BKN) path and delivers contact that affects his driving shot attempt.
Claxton (BKN) cleanly blocks Richardson's (MIA) shot attempt before the ball has reached its apex and started its downward flight towards the basket.
Herro (MIA) brings his forearm towards Thomas' (BKN) side and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) brings his hands forward towards Claxton (BKN), and marginal contact occurs as Adebayo releases away from the pick.
Richardson (MIA) faces up with Claxton (BKN) and impedes his pursuit of the rebound.
Richardson (MIA) legally contests Bridges' (BKN) jump shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in Smith Jr.'s (BKN) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court (offensive basket interference) was confirmed. 
 Claxton (BKN) makes contact with the ball while it is still in the imaginary cylinder above the rim.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in Smith Jr.'s (BKN) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Smith Jr. (BKN) moves laterally into Butler's (MIA) path and initiates body contact that occurs prior to Smith Jr. (BKN) making any contact with the ball.
Richardson (MIA) brings his left hand towards Bridges' (BKN) side and the contact during the drive is marginal.
Butler (MIA) stops his forward momentum, and the marginal contact occurs as Bridges (BKN) extends his leg backwards towards Butler.
